item.title: Building Go Applications with Gitlab CI
item.description: Intro Recently I’ve started building and deplyoing Go Applications with Gitlab CI. Today I wanna share how I build a Pipeline that aims to make your code more resilient and safe. The Pipeline Steps of a Pipeline First we should identify the steps we need in a Pipeline. We’ll split those into steps that verify and steps that transform, and steps that publish. Verify Linting Unit Tests / Integration Tests SAST Secret Detection Dependency Scanning Transform Building Verification Linter The first Step we’re gonna add is the Linter.
